sentences.en: As a kid he’d never share his toys.
sentences.cn: 他小时候从不肯与人分享他的玩具。

sentences.en: I drain the pasta, then I share it out between two plates.
sentences.cn: 我将意大利面滤干，然后平分到两个盘子里。

sentences.en: I have had more than my full share of adventures.
sentences.cn: 我已经有了太多丰富多彩的历险。

sentences.en: I've no money—we all share and share alike in camp.
sentences.cn: 我没有钱——我们都得在营地里分享一切。

sentences.en: It can be beneficial to share your feelings with someone you trust.
sentences.cn: 向自己信任的人倾诉感情是很有益处的。

sentences.en: Share prices and trading have been dulled by worries over the war.
sentences.cn: 股票价格和交易因人们对战争的忧虑而走低。

sentences.en: Share prices would have sunk — hurting small and big investors.
sentences.cn: 股票价格就会下跌——大小投资者均会遭受打击。

sentences.en: Speculation centred on a likely bid price of 380p a share.
sentences.cn: 大多数人猜测买方出价可能为每股380便士。

sentences.en: The company has steadily been losing market share to Boeing and Airbus.
sentences.cn: 该公司的市场份额持续不断地被波音公司和空中客车公司抢走。

sentences.en: The company is offering you the chance to share in its success.
sentences.cn: 公司正向你提供分享其成功的机会。

sentences.en: The firm's top managers share the same open-plan office.
sentences.cn: 该公司的高层管理人员共用一间开敞式办公室。

sentences.en: The FT 30 share index was up 16.4 points to 1,599.6.
sentences.cn: 《金融时报》30股指上涨16.4点，收于1,559.6点。

sentences.en: The three of us shared a taxi.
sentences.cn: 我们三个人合乘一辆计程车。

sentences.en: There are intangible benefits beyond a rise in the share price.
sentences.cn: 除股价上升之外还有无形利益。

sentences.en: They can transfer or share the contract with whosoever they choose.
sentences.cn: 他们可以与他们选择的任何人交换或分享这份合约。

sentences.en: They do, however, share a mutual interest in design.
sentences.cn: 不过他们确实都对设计感兴趣。

sentences.en: We don’t have enough books so you’ll have to share.
sentences.cn: 我们书不够，所以你们得合着用。

sentences.en: Women must receive their fair share of training for good-paying jobs.
sentences.cn: 女性必须获得她们理应得到的高薪工作培训。

sentences.en: Yes, I want to share my life with you.
sentences.cn: 是的，我想和你共度一生。

words.tran_cn: 分配者；共同收受者；参与分配或分红者
共享（share的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 分享，分担：同时或共同参与或承担，如在商业风险中
已发行股票；已发行股份
股份认购权（在一定时期内按预定价格买卖股票的权利）

trans.tran_cn: （应得或应承担的）一份，股份，股票
trans.tran_en: one of the equal parts into which the  ownership  of a company is divided
to have or use something with other people

trans.tran_cn: 共有，合用，分享，分担，分摊，同意，有共同之处，向…诉说
trans.tran_en: to let someone have or use something that belongs to you
